sections.heading: Scope of judgmentA default judgment shall not be different in kind from that demanded in the petition
sections.text: The amount of damages awarded shall be the amount proven to be properly due as a remedy.Amended by Acts 1988, No. 443, ยง2, eff. Jan. 1, 1989; Acts 2017, No. 419, ยง1; Acts 2021, No. 174, ยง1, eff. Ja
